mapper.select: SELECT t2.order_number, t1.update_time, t1.grade FROM tbl_evaluate_driver t1 INNER JOIN tbl_order t2 ON t1.order_id = t2.id WHERE t1.order_id = #{id} AND t1.grade > 1
SELECT t2.order_number, t1.update_time, t1.content FROM tbl_evaluate_driver t1 INNER JOIN tbl_order t2 ON t1.order_id = t2.id WHERE t1.order_id = #{id} AND t1.grade = 1
SELECT driver_id, FLOOR(AVG(grade)) AS GRADE FROM tbl_evaluate_driver WHERE date_format(update_time, '%Y%m') = date_format(DATE_SUB(curdate(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH), '%Y%m') GROUP BY driver_id

SELECT t2.id, t2.driver_id, t1.driving_licence_number, t2.grade, t2.test_date, t2.test_department FROM tbl_driver_base_info t1 INNER JOIN tbl_driver_rate t2 ON t1.id = t2.driver_id WHERE t2.id = #{id}
SELECT t1.id, t1.driver_id, t1.punish_time, t1.punish_result, t2.driving_licence_number FROM tbl_driver_punish t1 INNER JOIN tbl_driver_base_info t2 ON t1.driver_id = t2.id WHERE t1.id = #{id}
